BalanceAdjustmentRequest.name: BalanceAdjustmentRequest
BalanceAdjustmentRequest.description: The request to create a financial adjustment in a backend billing system. Adjustments requests can be for either debit or credit amounts. Often used to give the customer a goodwill gesture.

Amount.description: The monetary amount of balance adjustment being requested

ApprovedById.description: The user associated with approving the balance adjustment request

ApprovedOn.description: The date the balance adjustment request was approved

BillingAccountId.description: The billing profile associated with the balance adjustment request

BlockReason.description: Specifies the reason why the balance adjustment request is placed on hold from further processing

IsBlocked.description: Indicates whether the balance adjustment request is placed on hold from further processing

Reason.description: The reason that the balance adjustment is requested

Status.description: Specifies the current status of the balance adjustment request

Type.description: Specifies the type of balance adjustment requested
